rewardsSection.content: Every week we will be picking one trait. Every holder of a Vamp with that trait will get a lottery ticket. Then we will randomly pick 3 Vamps to win the prize! The prize is 2% of secondary sales from last week.

content: Listing on Magic Eden right after mint
Donating 5% of earnings from mint to Global Blood Fund
Giveaway of 1/1 Whole Lotta Red inspired album cover to a random holder
Using all royalties from secondary markets (5%) every week to sweep the floor
Creating an online space, where all Vamps can chill, chat and listen to some tunes
Continuation of Social Media marketing to keep on growing

faqItems.question: How to get rewards?
faqItems.answer: Every week we will be picking one trait. Every holder of a Vamp with that trait will get a lottery ticket. Then we will randomly pick 3 Vamps to win the prize! The prize is 2% of secondary sales from last week.

faqItems.question: What is solavamps?
faqItems.answer: SolaVamps is a Solana NFT project created by Playboi Carti fans for Playboi Carti fans. We are inspired by him and we want to build the best fanbase out there!

faqItems.question: What is the price of SolaVamp?
faqItems.answer: Price in presale is 0.08 SOL. Mint price is 0.1 SOL

faqItems.question: When does the presale and mint start?
faqItems.answer: Presale will start at the beginning of December. Mint will start a week after the presale. In presale we will be selling 200 unique Vamps with purple coats, which will not be available later.
